schema.name: Location_assignment_arm
schema.description: Represents context of the location within its usage for a product or other physical entity

type.name: assignment_qualifier
type.description: type of role of assigned location. This describes the usage of the location entity, examples are planned, realized, scheduled , constraint, approved, authorized, preferred

type.name: location_assignment_effetivity_item
type.description: defines the effectivity for the location assignment

type.name: Location_assignment_select
type.description: Selects the type, where the location is assigned to

type.name: purpose
type.description: defines possible purposes of location assignments as extensible select Examples are: - operating - storage - maintenance - engineering - takes place at (for events and activities)

entity.name: Location_assignment
entity.description: defines the relationship of a product, event or person to a location for a purpose. There may be distinct assignment for each qualification. for example planned, scheduled or actual. Each assignment may have a start and end date/time. A Location may have multiple assignments.

explicit.name: assignment_qualification
explicit.description: qualifies the assignment is qualified for

explicit.name: description
explicit.description: textual description of the meaning of this location assignment

explicit.name: entity_for_location
explicit.description: Identifies the product, person, product_group, event or activity which is related to the specified location

explicit.name: location_for_assignment
explicit.description: defines the location which is subject of this assignment

explicit.name: purpose_for_location_assignment
explicit.description: identifies the purpose of the assignment of the location to the entity
